sentence.Network_en: Five countries accounted for 77 percent of the total quota, with Mauritius alone receiving 38 percent.
sentence.Network_cn: 5国家占有总配额的77%, 毛里求斯一国独得38%.

sentence.Network_en: But three African countries were rated higher: Benin, Namibia and Mauritius.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是三个非洲国家: 贝宁湾 、 纳米比亚和毛里求斯排名更高.

sentence.Network_en: We entrust your company to be our business agent in Mauritius.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将委托贵公司作为我公司在毛里求斯的业务代理.原译文.
